content: Wow cheap charms as craft bling hey friends
and fellow crafters I want to talk about a resource I found for crafting that can
add a neat little detail to your projects and those are charms ok I was
going around eBay one day and I discovered these really cool and fairly
inexpensive charms most of them had no shipping at all
we're very inexpensive for like you know up to a dozen depending on the charm of
course but just a really really cool designs very inexpensive the best hits I
had I found were if I typed charm dragon I got a lot of cool designs and also
charm sword I got a lot of different neat cool designs too so what I thought
I'd do is let's go to the table and I'll show you some of these cool designs I
picked up and if you like some of this stuff and you want to add it to your
projects hit eBay and just like I said hit charms and Dragon or sword and
you're gonna find most of this stuff so stay with us and I'll show you what
those charms of light one thing you'll notice on the charms is
they have a little loop on the top of course for the chain to go through but
you can easily use a wire cutter and cut that off and then you're all set to go
